Package suggestions

Interface SuggestionEditor

All Known Implementing Classes:
StudentCommittee
public interface SuggestionEditor
Methods that relate to editing Suggestions are implemented here.

  • Method Details

    • suggestionMaker

      static void suggestionMaker(Camp selectedCamp, User activeUser, List<Suggestion> suggestionList)
      This method creates Suggestions. To be used by StudentCommittee.
      Some restrictions are placed on the StudentCommittee on what they are allowed to suggest. StudentCommittee can only ever suggest in these 5 fields:
      Camp Name, Venue, Description, Max Slots and Committee Slots
      This makes use of CampEdit.tryEditCamp() to validate some of the fields that can be suggested.
      Parameters:
      selectedCamp - Camp object to be suggested on
      activeUser - User object making the suggestion
      suggestionList - List of all Suggestions

    • changeCategoryValue

      static void changeCategoryValue(List<Suggestion> suggestionList, Suggestion suggestion)
      Interface for and resolves the selection of category value to change.
      Parameters:
      suggestionList - List of all Suggestions to save program state
      suggestion - Suggestion to change category value

    • editMenu

      static void editMenu(StudentCommittee studComm, List<Suggestion> suggestionList)
      This menu provides the logic and the interface for editing a Suggestion
      Parameters:
      studComm - The user editing the Suggestion
      suggestionList - List of all Suggestions to save program state

    • editSuggestion

      static void editSuggestion(Suggestion suggestion, List<Suggestion> SuggestionList)
      This provides the interface and logic for editing a Suggestion.
      The User can choose to change the Suggestion description or Suggestion change itself
      Any changes to the Suggestion value or category requires both to be re-entered
      Parameters:
      suggestion - Suggestion object to be edited
      SuggestionList - List of all Suggestion objects to save program state

    • deleteSuggestion

      static void deleteSuggestion(StudentCommittee studComm, Suggestion suggestion, List<Suggestion> SuggestionList)
      This method provides the logic to delete a Suggestion
      Parameters:
      studComm - Student deleting the suggestion
      suggestion - Suggestion to be deleted
      SuggestionList - List of all Suggestion object, to save program state.
